metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20203 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: In multiple locations of the nanopb library, there is a possible way tocorrupt memory when decoding untrusted protobuf files. This could lead tolocal escalation of privilege,with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: nanopb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
